Class PersonVsPerson

  • java.lang.Object
    • PersonVsPerson

  • public class PersonVsPerson
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a new player vs player game and runs it Each player sets up their ships and take turns trying to sink each others' ships
    Version:
    May 26, 2020
    Author:
    Jacqueline Wen, Period: 4, Assignment: Battleship, Sources: Meghana Muddireddy

      int gameOver()
      Returns whether the game is over
      void inputForMap()

      void runningGame()
      Sets up the game and makes sure the game is running until a player wins

      • gameOver

        public int gameOver()
        Returns whether the game is over
        Returns:
        0 if not over, 1 if person 1 wins, 2 if person 2 wins
